articles.title: Mahindra Scorpio-N 4WD and Automatic variant details out - Team-BHP
articles.description: The Mahindra Scorpio-N was launched on June 27. At the time, the carmaker announced the pricing for the Petrol MT and Diesel MT variants. The prices of the automatic and 4-wheel drive variants will be announced on July 21.
